products.title: HVDC Circuit Breaker
products.description: The new high voltage DC circuit breaker is a kind of product based on the“Artificial intelligence zero crossing”converter technology. The new product perfectly solves the technical defects of the traditional high voltage DC circuit breaker, such as slow operating speed, long arc extinguishing time and so on.

features.title: Power system reliability
features.text: Through the“mechanical DC circuit breaker” technology, the abnormal power branch system is quickly disconnected.

features.title: Smart features
features.text: Product integration intelligent monitoring and automatic control functions, improve the level of intelligence of the system, can be real-time on-line monitoring.

features.title: Miniaturization
features.text: The design is more compact, takes up less space, and is conducive to system integration and layout requirements.

features.title: Smart operation
features.text: Intelligent diagnosis component state, the implementation is bad recovery.

products.title: High-Voltage Substation with E-house
products.description: Prefabricated modular substations have outstanding advantages such as fast construction, small footprint, low investment, and flexible layout, and are widely used in the construction of substations in various fields such as new energy, petroleum, coal, industrial users, and urban centers.

features.title: Product technical solution
features.text: 1. The core of a substation is its equipment, and Siyuan has the research and production capabilities for a full range of primary and secondary power equipment in substations. 2. The typical layout scheme of the E-house covers 10~330kV substations, and the E-house has independent and customized design capabilities. Through rational design of structural strength, anti-corrosion, insulation, HVAC, dust and waterproof, it meets various substation operating conditions and has the most complete test report on the market. 3. Fifteen years of experience in domestic and international substation EPC projects, able to provide turnkey projects for customers

features.title: Reduce costs, increase efficiency, and create value
features.text: 1. Large scale production with good efficiency and high quality at the same price, creating maximum value for customers. 2. Strong overall optimization design capabilities, providing optimal system solutions, and reducing the comprehensive cost of substations through site layout, equipment selection recommendations, and other aspects.

products.title: Mobile High-Voltage Substation
products.description: Mobile High-Voltage Substations are a flexible and efficient power solution designed for rapid deployment and temporary power supply. They integrate transformers, switching equipment, and protective devices, capable of operating in various environments and suitable for emergency power, construction sites, events, and temporary facilities. Their modular design facilitates transportation and installation, ensuring a quick response to changes in power demand.

features.title: Quick Launch and Benefit Protection
features.text: By leasing mobile substation equipment, the factory can operate quickly with load to ensure customer benefits

features.title: Capacity Enhancement and Stability Improvement of Power Systems
features.text: The original substation's main transformer is expanded to increase capacity, and load transfer is provided through the lease of mobile substations to provide more stable power guarantees

features.title: Compact layout and flexible transportation
features.text: Compact structure, small volume, easy to transport, occupies less land, and is very mobile for investment and withdrawal

products.title: Oil Immersed Insulated Power Transformer
products.description: Sieyuan Toshiba's Oil-Immersed Power Transformer is designed and manufactured with Toshiba's core technology, covering voltage ratings up to 750kV. It features low losses, low noise, minimal partial discharge, and high short-circuit impedance, making it suitable for diverse installation environments and demanding operating conditions.

features.title: Highly Reliable Design
features.text: Incorporating Toshiba Japan technology with stringent quality control throughout the entire process to ensure long-term stable operation.

features.title: Superior Performance
features.text: Features low loss, low noise, low partial discharge, and high short-circuit resistance

features.title: Customized Solutions
features.text: Professional tailored solutions to meet diverse environmental and operational

products.title: Gas Insulated Power Transformer
products.description: Gas-insulated transformers utilize inert gas as the insulating medium, featuring compact structure, fireproof and explosion-proof characteristics, making them particularly suitable for space-constrained installations like urban substations. These transformers offer high reliability, near-maintenance-free operation, and excellent environmental adaptability.
bullets: Extended service life and hassle-free maintenance

features.title: Reliable quality and outstanding performance
features.text: Our products deliver reliable quality and outstanding performance. Manufactured with industry-leading specialized production and testing equipment in dedicated dust-proof, moisture-resistant, and temperature-controlled GIS transformer workshops. Standard models comply with GB 20052-2024 Class II energy efficiency requirements, while custom-designed models meeting Class I energy efficiency standards are available upon request.

features.title: Explosion-proof and non-flammable
features.text: DUtilizing inert gas as insulation medium, it demonstrates minimal tank pressure increase during internal faults compared to conventional oil-immersed transformers, completely eliminating tank rupture risks and ensuring absolute safety for substation equipment, achieving true explosion-proof and fire-proof performance.

features.title: Space saving and high reliability
features.text: With customizable R&D solutions, it flexibly adapts to diverse application scenarios. The integrated structural design significantly reduces overall substation costs, while offering flexible main transformer room layout, easy installation, and maintenance-free operation.

features.title: Extended service life and hassle-free maintenance
features.text: By positioning the cooler air pumps in the lower low-temperature zone, it effectively slows lubricant and gear aging, extending pump service life by over 30%. The innovative
design enables safer and more convenient maintenance, reducing user maintenance frequency by 50% while significantly improving operational efficiency.

products.title: High Voltage Shunt Reactor
products.description: Sieyuan Toshiba's High-Voltage Shunt Reactor features low noise, high reliability, and safe operation. It effectively neutralizes the capacitive effect of EHV long-distance transmission lines, absorbs excess reactive power, and improves power transmission efficiency. Additionally, It suppresses harmonic currents in the power system, enhancing power quality for end-users.

features.title: Low loss, low noise, and high reliability
features.text: The shunt reactor adopts a radial iron disc structure with high core fill factor, uniform magnetic flux distribution, negligible leakage flux, and low no-load loss. The iron discs are separated by special non-magnetic spacers (e.g., marble), and the entire assembly is vacuum-impregnated with epoxy resin, ensuring minimal vibration and ultra-low operational noise.

products.title: 145kV Gas Insulated Switchgear
products.description: ZF28A-145 Gas Insulated Switchgear is a three-phase AC high-voltage electrical equipment, which is designed for controlling, measuring, protecting, and switching power transmission lines, and can be combined into the required main wiring arrangement according to user requirements.

features.title: Compact structure
features.text: It features a three-phase common enclosure design, allowing for flexible and convenient engineering arrangement.

features.title: High reliability
features.text: It adopts a double-channel sealing structure, ensuring an annual gas leakage rate of less than 0.1%. With excellent insulation performance, it exhibits a whole bay partial discharge of less than 3pC. It also features a three-station isolation earthing switch structure, which includes mechanical interlock between the isolation and earthing mechanisms for effectively avoiding misoperation.

features.title: High safety
features.text: With busbars and outgoing lines arranged on both sides of the circuit breaker, and inspection and maintenance accesses provided on both sides of the bay, it eliminates the need to enter the bay for routing inspection.

features.title: High modularity
features.text: The product boasts a highly modular design. The connecting flanges are of standardized dimensions, allowing for flexible configuration according to requirements, and the modules are highly interchangeable, facilitating expansion and the optimization of substation layout.

products.title: 252/550kV Gas-Insulated Transmission Line
products.description: GXL 28-252/550 Gas-insulated Transmission Line is a transmission line with high voltage level, large transmission capacity and high safety and reliability. It features a safer, more efficient, green and intelligent transmission mode than cable and overhead line.

features.title: Excellent performance
features.text: It boasts a particularly high transmission capacity, with a maximum current of up to 8000A, and exhibits minimal thermal and electrical energy losses, resulting in good energy-saving effect.

features.title: High safety
features.text: It has good protection performance, and is characterized by less maintenance work and an extremely low failure rate. It shows strong resistance against disasters such as ice, snow, and earthquakes, and offers excellent fire protection performance, ensuring high safety and reliability

features.title: Good usability
features.text: It is easy to maintain and inspect, and has a long service life. It covers a small space, supports a wide voltage range, and can be installed in various ways.

products.title: ZHW58A Hybrid Gas Insulated Switchgear
products.description: ZHW58A combined apparatus integrates modules such as circuit breaker, DS, ES, CT, PT, FES, etc. It features a small footprint, strong environmental adaptability, high reliability, and maintenance-free operation. The rated voltage covers 40.5-145kV, making it suitable for high-voltage power transmission and distribution applications such as substations.

features.title: Compact structure
features.text: Three-phase split-tank design with an integrated base frame. Enables integral three-phase transportation by bay, ensuring convenient and reliable on-site installation.

features.title: Excellent electrical performance
features.text: Superior insulation properties. Integral partial discharge <3pC. Horizontal breaker layout structure enables switching capability of 40kA.

features.title: UReliable mechanical performance
features.text: Employs a new integrated die-cast aluminum base spring operating mechanism. Compact structural design with stable output performance ensures high reliability and maintenance-free operation. Mechanical life meets M2 class requirements.

features.title: Highly modular design
features.text: Modular design approach. Standardized connection flange dimensions enable flexible configuration according to requirements. Strong module interchangeability facilitates functional expansion to optimize substation layout.

products.title: ZW39 Outdoor HV AC Vacuum Circuit Breaker
products.description: ZW39 Vacuum Circuit Breaker is an eco-friendly outdoor high-voltage AC switching equipment featuring strong environmental adaptability, high reliability, and maintenance-free operation. Configurable with internal or external CT per user requirements. Suitable for high-voltage power transmission and distribution applications including substations, distribution networks, and railways.

features.title: Eco-friendly design
features.text: Employs vacuum interrupter units with nitrogen or clean air as insulating medium. Fluorine-free solution with GWP value of 0.

features.title: Superior environmental adaptability
features.text: Insulating medium eliminates low-temperature liquefaction risks. No exposed mechanical transmission components. Withstands harsh conditions including -50℃ extreme cold, high altitude, condensation, and ice coverage.

features.title: Reliable mechanical performance
features.text: Adopts an integrated die-cast aluminum base spring operating mechanism. Compact structural design ensures stable output performance, high reliability, and maintenance-free operation. Mechanical life meets M2 class requirements.

features.title: Excellent breaking performance
features.text: Full product series delivers breaking capacity up to 40kA, suitable for diverse complex operating conditions.

products.title: LW58A Outdoor HV AC SF6 Circuit Breaker
products.description: LW58A Outdoor High-voltage AC SF₆ Tank Circuit Breaker features strong environmental adaptability, high reliability, and maintenance-free operation. With a rated voltage covering 40.5-800kV, it provides three-pole intertripping & pole-discrepancy operation solutions. Suitable for high-voltage power transmission and distribution applications including substations and distribution networks.

features.title: Compact design
features.text: Integrated with external CT, reduced product footprint, low center of gravity, and excellent seismic performance.

features.title: High reliability
features.text: Adopts a new integrated die-cast aluminum base spring operating mechanism. Compact structural design ensures stable output performance, high reliability, and maintenance-free operation. Mechanical life meets M2 class requirements.

features.title: Superior interrupting performance
features.text: Utilizes dual-motion self-energy & assisted compression arc-extinguishing technology. Delivers strong interrupting capability across the entire series (up to 63kA), suitable for diverse complex conditions.

features.title: Excellent sealing performance
features.text: Employs diaphragm sealing structure. SF₆ gas leakage rate ≤0.05% per year.

products.title: GW4 Outdoor HV AC Disconnector
products.description: GW4 Series product is a double-column horizontal rotary type outdoor high-voltage disconnector. Rated voltage covers 12-550kV.

features.title: Conductive material & current-carrying performance
features.text: Conductive arms employ slot-shaped aluminum alloy profiles (high conductivity, high strength) with anodized surface treatment. Combines corrosion resistance, high mechanical strength, and excellent heat dissipation. Supports maximum rated current of 5000A with short-time withstand current up to 63kA.

features.title: Novel contact structure
features.text: Self-energized contact fingers utilize chrome bronze alloy’s inherent elasticity to clamp the contact blade. Beyond meeting standard current-carrying requirements, it satisfies short-term thermal load and electromagnetic force under short-circuit faults while offering superior mechanical wear resistance.

features.title: Fully sealed bearing housing
features.text: Die-cast aluminum bearing housing adopts fully sealed structure. Prevents lubricant loss or solidification, eliminating oil replenishment maintenance. Internal combined-support bearing design ensures gravity torque and horizontal component force are respectively borne by two specialized bearings.

features.title: Maintenance-free transmission
features.text: Transmission system designed per maintenance-free requirements. Self-lubricating bushings paired with stainless steel pins prevent binding issues in rotating components.

products.title: Protection Relay: IES-311 Feeder Protection
products.description: IES-311 is a microprocessor-based protection, control and monitoring device designed for various primary equipments (such as overhead line, underground cable and auxiliary transformer etc.) on solidly grounded, Peterson coil grounded, low impedance grounded and ungrounded system. With flexible and powerful configuration tool, IES-311 offers future-oriented system solutions with high investment security and low operating costs. The device is freely programmable. Functional logic diagrams can be developed with the use of graphical programming tool which also supports the configuration of binary inputs and outputs, analog inputs, control buttons, LEDs, disturbance recorder, event recorder, and user interface. Freely programmable logic makes it possible to modify typical functional logic diagrams considering a peculiar nature of the protected object. Three basic types of standard 19” case help to choose the most appropriate solution.

features.title: Highly Flexible
features.text: Support 6 currents and 5 voltages inputs. Together with flexible PLC logic, it can easily realize the automatic switchover of backup power supply.

features.title: Multiple Funtion
features.text: Powerful GOOSE function helps to realize the simple busbar protection and shortens the busbar fault clearing time.

features.title: High Realibility
features.text: Unique phase selection element to avoid the problem of wrong selection of multiple phases by using out-of-range phase selection elements.

features.title: Fast Tripping
features.text: With special processing in CB failure protection, the dropout time of current criterion element is less than 12 ms.

features.title: High Accuracy
features.text: Support fault location function which can locate the fault location with the deviation less than 5%.

features.title: Widely Application
features.text: Up to 10 remote control outputs which can meet the control requirements of multiple breakers, switches and ground switches.

specifications.Dimensions (W×H×D): 455×266.7×233.5mm（6U，without mounting bracket), 221.3x266.7x233.5mm（6U 1/2，without mounting bracket), 160.3x266.7x233.5mm（6U 1/3，without mounting bracket

features.description: IES-302 bay control unit is a general purpose control and automation device in all substations, powerplants and industrial domain applications. The modular conception permits the hardware adaption exact to client requirements. It adopts unified software and hardware platform, supports comprehensive functions including protection, control, measurement and monitoring, is easy to use and maintain.The device is freely programmable. Three basic types of standard 19” case help to choose the most appropriate solution.

features.title: Highly Flexible
features.text: Offers optional functions including voltage, current, power, and frequency protection, which form a complete backup protection. Supports DC analog input and DC analog output.

features.title: Multiple Funtion
features.text: Support rich control functions, with optional functions as synchronization, reclosing, AVR, etc. HMI operation is simple and easy to use, providing single-line diagram display and control functions. Provide up to 15th harmonic measurement, as well as function of energy metering and power quality calculation.

features.title: Easy Maintenance
features.text: Remote control, measurement, and other components are open to users for configuration. Each slot on the hardware can be assigned with I/O.

products.title: PowerPT/SSVT: Station service voltage transformer（SSVT
products.description: SSVT is a kind of high power station service voltage transformer, which can take power directly from the line of the power grid and provide power for the secondary equipment. There are usually three main applications:1.Substation power supply: Provide power for lighting and relay system in switching substation; 2.Island power supply: Electrification of remote areas; 3.Mobile variable power supply scheme: power supply for engineering construction

features.text: Direct from HV bus to station service without MV.

products.description: Oil-SF6 bushing is a bushing installed between oil immersed transformers and SF6 switchgear（GIS）, with one end immersed in transformer oil and the other end immersed in SF6 the switchgear（GIS).

features.text: The products are oil-free, explosion-proof, environmentally friendly, maintenance-free, and have good mechanical performance.

products.title: Ultra-high Voltage DC Bushing
products.description: Converter Transformer Bushing is one of the most critical components of the transformer. The lead wires of the transformer winding pass through the bushing, insulating the lead wires from each other and from the ground, while also serving to fix the lead wires. DC wall bushing is a conduit used for insulation and support of high-voltage conductive parts passing through walls or other grounding objects, installed on the walls or roofs of buildings such as converter valve halls.

products.description: The basic constituent unit of a capacitor bank, consisting of one or more capacitor elements assembled in the same housing with terminals for connection.

features.text: Equipped with advanced automated production lines: wire winding; insulation resistance testing; fuse assembly; core pressing, winding, and packaging processes are all completed on automated assembly lines, ensuring high product consistency and stable quality.

products.title: Open Rack Type Capacitor Installation sets
products.description: The capacitor set consisting of parallel capacitors, series reactors, isolating switches, discharge coils, surge arresters, brackets, etc. is installed in shunt with the power grid for reactive power compensation and harmonic filtering.

Product coverage area is wide and covers various industries

features.title: The product specifications cover various voltage grades.
features.text: We can design and manufacture Shunt, Series, AC filter, and DC filter capacitors as well as test capacitor towers ranging from 6kV to 1000kV.

features.title: Product coverage area is wide and covers various industries
features.text: Product coverage area is wide and covers various industries, including Power, Transportation, Metallurgy, Petrochemical, Steel, Power Generation, Coal mining, Ports, etc.

features.title: Modular Design
features.text: Horizontal installation, small footprint, meets the requirements of complete assembly and transportation, with minimal on-site installation work and easy maintenance.

features.title: High adaptability
features.text: The device can be designed to meet the requirements of the operating environment, such as high anti-pollution, high anti-corrosion, high anti-seismic, and high-altitude, to adapt to various harsh environments.

products.title: Earthing Transformer
products.description: The earthing transformer is usually used in a power system without neutral point, to provide an artificial neutral connection for earthing directly or via an impedance such as an arc suppression reactor, a resistor, a current-limiting reactor and so on.The grounding transformer may adopt a secondary (low-voltage winding) for continuous use as a power supply for the substation station.

products.title: Arc Suppression Coil
products.description: The arc-suppression coil can provide an inductive current to compensate for the short-circuit capacitive current in case of a grounding fault, reduce the grounding current and finally achieve the purpose of arc self-extinguishing, effectively reducing the arc overvoltage.

features.title: Full series product
features.text: Products cover 6kV-66kV，independent design and production of all primary and secondary equipment of arc suppression coil. We have good research on the performance of various type of products and we accumulated rich operation experience.

features.title: High reliability
features.text: Controller adopts the secondary power supply technique, can withstand destructive electromagnetic interference, the primary and secondary system all adopt the optical/electrical isolation, can completely eliminate the interference of a system to the controller. Controller design for double reset circuit, which can realize the system automatic recovery.

products.title: Neutral Grounding Resistor
products.description: In the neutral grounding modes of the distribution network, the neutral grounding through small-resistor is a commonly used grounding mode. This mode can effectively limit the intermittent arc grounding overvoltage and reduce the system operating overvoltage.

features.title: High temperature durability
features.text: The melting point is up to 1390°C, and the maximum operating temperature is 1100°C

features.title: Stable resistance
features.text: Small temperature coefficient, reliably guaranteeing the protection sensitivity

features.title: Good anti-oxidation ability
features.text: Able to maintain excellent anti-oxidation performance under high temperature of 1100°C, suitable for badly-polluted environment

features.title: High toughness
features.text: Able to maintain good toughness and is not prone to fracture under operating conditions with drastic temperature changes

products.title: Flexible Grounding Device
products.description: The flexible grounding system is provided with the advantages of the resonance grounding technology and the low resistor grounding technology, which enables free switching from one grounding mode to another to be easily achieved under different fault conditions. It not only largely ensures the safety of equipment and personel, but also guarantees high reliability of power supply.

features.title: High reliability
features.text: Adjusts grounding mode based on system state.

features.title: Quickly isolate faults
features.text: Interfaces with protection and control schemes.

features.title: High accuracy in selecting lines
features.text: Designed with a line selection tripping unit, ensure accurate cut-off of the faulty unit.

specifications.Volt-ampere Characteristics: Excellent linearity within 0-110% rated voltage range
